title: 'Typography as art'
content:
Hi  
I'm looking for examples of 'Typography as art' ie where letterform is the only or main part of a piece of art.  
If you have any links or suggestions I would be happy to hear them.  
Stephen R
author: stephen

In sweden we have a designer Gabor Palotai, he often uses only typography to create his design/art. However I’m not sure it is supposed to be called art or not — and btw, who is the judge of that — but it sure is "arty". He has done a few books that is quite cool.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/prhardsoft_5768.jpg)
The most popular and well known is probably "Love" by Robert Indiana.

Look for Arabic, there is an old 1990 Baseline magazine with some good examples. I had it but someone at Microsoft didn't give it back to me.

[http://www.islamicart.com/main/calligraphy/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/www.islamicart.com/main/calligraphy/index.html "http://www.islamicart.com/main/calligraphy/index.html")

There has been a great exhbition at British Museum recently [Word into Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/www.thebritishmuseum.ac.uk/middleeastnow/word-into-art/index.html) I was so impressed that when I wento to Morocco I had bought some caligraphy in Essouaria and my wife started caligraphy doodling.

Of the arabic theme, there are some interesting typographic works in the 'Community' \> 'Galeria' section _[here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/www.arabictypography.com/flash.html)_

[Tom Phillips](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/www.tomphillips.co.uk/humument/index.html)

Nick Cooke

Oh yes, I second that Arabic is beautiful, but for me arabic is more an art of calligraphy, not typography. Two weeks ago I was to a seminar with Linotype’s Nadine Chahine who is developing the arabic fonts at Linotype. Some examples that she showed of old arabic calligraphy, it just blew my mind – so beautiful pieces of art.

Jasper Johns ( [numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/www.shunn.net/bill/log/img/numbers.jpg) and [alphabets](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019141954/http:/pages.britishlibrary.net/poetry.express/graphics/Jasper%20Johns%20-%20Grey%20Alphabets%201956%20-%20Houston.jpg)).
